actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct, once every ten years, a national survey on the impact of federal health care expenditures.

summary.text: Amends title III (General Powers and Duties) of the Public Health Service Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct decennially a national survey on the impact of Federal health care expenditures for health care under programs carried out by the Public Health Service and other entities of the Department of Health and Human Services. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1987 through 1989.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Act to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct, once every ten years, a national survey on the impact of federal health care expenditures.
